Sample Sentence: Even when she’s having a bad day, my mom always has an upbeat attitude.

Definition: To cause a change of course.

Definition: Someone who is inexperienced or not highly skilled in a particular area.

Definition: To give something (usually money or time) to a common fund or cause.
Sample Sentence: Every roommate contributes part of his paycheck to the grocery bill.

Definition: A skeletal structure designed to support something.

Definition: Taking up a lot of space.

The twins were completely identical.

Definition: To come between people, objects, or an event and change what is happening.

The company exploited its workers by making them work long hours.

Definition: To say no to something that is offered.

Definition: To become weak; to be neglected.

Definition: A period or stage in a process.

Definition: To help raise or increase something.

Definition: Something that causes delay or resistance.

Definition: A space in between two objects.

Definition: To wander from the main subject.

Definition: To oversee work or a process.

Definition: To find the size and dimensions of something.

Definition: To speak poorly of; to slander.

Definition: The smallest or lowest amount possible.

Definition: To make changes that improve something.

Definition: Things that follow each other in a certain order.

Definition: To further to progress of something.

Definition: Abrupt to the point of rudeness.

Definition: To increase to the greatest possible size.

Definition: To take the place of something else.

Definition: To brag or talk with excessive pride.
